name: Grandpa Buick's Famous Potato Salad
author: kar6man
summary: This is a secret family recipe from my late Grandpa. This will be the best potato salad at any BBQ or dinner that you take it to.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) jar sweet pickles, drained and finely diced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place red potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender and the peels begin to crack, about 20 minutes
Peel cooled potatoes and cut into 1/8-inch dice
Place potatoes, shrimp, onions, hard-cooked eggs, sweet pickles, and mayonnaise into a large salad bowl and stir to combine
Season with salt and black pepper; sprinkle top of salad with paprika
Chill salad at least 3 hours before serving
